posts.post_title: F/S....1883 HARPER's Woodcut (colored) of Chicago ballpark....SOLD
posts.post_content:
Scene is the White Stockings Lakefront Park in Chicago. With 10,000 seats (including private boxes), this ballpark had the largest seating capacity
of any Major League park of its time. Drawn by well known artist of that era, W. P. Snyder.

SOLD.

This picture is completely matted and will be delivered (free) in a securely packaged box. 



[IMG]http://i603.photobucket.com/albums/tt113/zanted86/1883lakefrontparkchicago.jpg[/IMG]



Email me directly at......tedzan11@comcast.net

Please NO PM's

Thanks,

TED Z
